name: RobustParseJSON
description: Parse JSON string with error handling and convert it to Data objects (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from typing import List
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MultilineInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
import json
import re

class RobustJSONParserComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Robust JSON Parser"
    description = "Parse JSON string with error handling and convert it to Data objects"
    icon = "üêç"
    name = "RobustJSONParser"

    inputs = [
        MultilineInput(
            name="json_string",
            display_name="JSON String",
            info="The JSON string to parse.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(
            name="data_output",
            display_name="Data Output",
            method="parse_json",
        ),
    ]

    def clean_json_string(self, json_string: str) -> str:
        json_string = re.sub(r'[\x00-\x1F\x7F-\x9F]', '', json_string)
        json_string = json_string.replace("'", '"')
        json_string = ' '.join(json_string.split())
        return json_string

    def parse_json(self) -> List[Data]:
        json_string = self.json_string
        if not json_string:
            return [Data(text="No JSON string provided.", additional_kwargs="input_missing")]
        
        try:
            cleaned_json = self.clean_json_string(json_string)
            data = json.loads(cleaned_json)
            formatted_json = json.dumps(data, indent=2)
            return [Data(text=formatted_json, additional_kwargs="input_json")]
        except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
            error_message = f"Error parsing JSON: {str(e)}\nCleaned JSON string: {cleaned_json}"
            return [Data(text=error_message, additional_kwargs="json_parse_error")]
        except Exception as e:
            return [Data(text=f"Unexpected error: {str(e)}", additional_kwargs="unexpected_error")]

    def execute_function_data(self) -> List[Data]:
        return self.parse_json()

    def execute_function_message(self) -> Message:
        data_list = self.parse_json()
        results_str = "\n".join([f"Content: {data.text}\nMetadata: {data.additional_kwargs}" for data in data_list])
        return Message(text=results_str)
code.name: code

node.description: Parse JSON string with error handling and convert it to Data objects

code.value:
from typing import List
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MultilineInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
import json
import re

class RobustJSONParserComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Robust JSON Parser"
    description = "Parse JSON string with error handling and convert it to Data objects"
    icon = "üêç"
    name = "RobustJSONParser"

    inputs = [
        MultilineInput(
            name="json_string",
            display_name="JSON String",
            info="The JSON string to parse.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(
            name="data_output",
            display_name="Data Output",
            method="parse_json",
        ),
    ]

    def clean_json_string(self, json_string: str) -> str:
        json_string = re.sub(r'[\x00-\x1F\x7F-\x9F]', '', json_string)
        json_string = json_string.replace("'", '"')
        json_string = ' '.join(json_string.split())
        return json_string

    def parse_json(self) -> List[Data]:
        json_string = self.json_string
        if not json_string:
            return [Data(text="No JSON string provided.", additional_kwargs="input_missing")]
        
        try:
            cleaned_json = self.clean_json_string(json_string)
            data = json.loads(cleaned_json)
            formatted_json = json.dumps(data, indent=2)
            return [Data(text=formatted_json, additional_kwargs="input_json")]
        except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
            error_message = f"Error parsing JSON: {str(e)}\nCleaned JSON string: {cleaned_json}"
            return [Data(text=error_message, additional_kwargs="json_parse_error")]
        except Exception as e:
            return [Data(text=f"Unexpected error: {str(e)}", additional_kwargs="unexpected_error")]

    def execute_function_data(self) -> List[Data]:
        return self.parse_json()

    def execute_function_message(self) -> Message:
        data_list = self.parse_json()
        results_str = "\n".join([f"Content: {data.text}\nMetadata: {data.additional_kwargs}" for data in data_list])
        return Message(text=results_str)
